price: (13) Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.[1725]
footnotes: [1725]- i.e., claiming a particular lineage falsely.  The description given in these verses is of al-Waleed bin al-Mugheerah (see also 74:11-25) or possibly, as asserted by Ibn Katheer, al-Akhnas bin Shurayq.
